Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an even greater asset in your hands. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this remarkable product to you at a price of $1100000. This amount reflects our commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you find this proposal acceptable, please let us know promptly so we can proceed with the transaction. We look forward to the opportunity of serving you and contributing to your success with this outstanding product. Warm regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
